Question: Fectar CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Fectar

Fectar CES 2024

- One platform for Virtual and Augmented Reality
- Build VR & AR for VR Headsets and Smartphones in one go
- No coding skills required for creating interactive 3D content
- Device independent design for seamless functionality across various devices
- Fectar Studio for easy-to-use VR & AR platform suitable for all experience levels
- Intuitive content creation with industry-leading analytics
- Collaborative VR & AR sessions
- Cross-platform deployment for maximum performance
- Multi-Device support for Quest, Pico, HTC, iOS, and Android
- Create interactive VR & AR experiences for Metaverse Learning Spaces, Virtual Shopping Centers, and Training Centers
Summary_cn:
Fectar

Fectar CES 2024

- 一站式虚拟现实和增强现实平台
- 一次构建适用于虚拟现实头显和智能手机的虚拟现实和增强现实内容
- 创建交互式3D内容无需编程技能
- 设备无关设计，可在不同设备上无缝运行
- Fectar Studio，易于使用的虚拟现实和增强现实平台，适用于所有经验水平
- 行业领先的分析功能，直观的内容创建
- 协同虚拟现实和增强现实会话
- 跨平台部署，实现最佳性能
- 支持Quest、Pico、HTC、iOS和Android等多种设备
- 创建适用于元宇宙学习空间、虚拟购物中心和培训中心的交互式虚拟现实和增强现实体验
